actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution to request Federal agencies administering programs for older Americans to study the causes of crime against older Americans and to recommend programs to reduce the frequency of such programs to reduce the frequency of such crimes.

summary.text: Requests Federal agencies administering programs for older Americans to study the causes of crimes against older Americans and to recommend programs to reduce the frequency of such crimes.
